solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int minCut(String s) {--newline--        char[] c = s.toCharArray();--newline--        int n = c.length;--newline--        int[] cut = new int[n];--newline--        boolean[][] pal = new boolean[n][n];--newline--        --newline--        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {--newline--            int min = i;--newline--            for(int j = 0; j <= i; j++) {--newline--                if(c[j] == c[i] && (j + 1 > i - 1 || pal[j + 1][i - 1])) {--newline--                    pal[j][i] = true;  --newline--                    min = j == 0 ? 0 : Math.min(min, cut[j - 1] + 1);--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--            cut[i] = min;--newline--        }--newline--        return cut[n - 1];--newline--    }--newline--}
